title: Cup And Saucer, "Insignia", ca. 1965
markings: underside of cup and saucer: Lomonosov "LFZ" mark stamped in green overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shaprio Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Cup (a) cylindrical, flaring towards top, red loop handle; insignia painted on one side inscribed (in Russian) "The Patriotic War." The saucer (b) painted with folded striped ribbon circling border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cup And Saucer, "Insignia", ca. 1965.
ca. 1965. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-112-a,b.
